00014 #ifndef USERSWITCH_H
00015 #define USERSWITCH_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 #include "ParserThread.h"
00019 
00020 class UserItem;
00021 
00026 class UserSwitch {
00027 public:
00028 
00029    UserSwitch( ParserThread& thread,
00030                UserItem* newUser,
00031                const ClientSetting* settings ):
00032       m_thread( thread ),
00033       m_oldUser( thread.getCurrentUser() ),
00034       m_oldClientSetting( thread.getClientSetting() ),
00035       m_newUser( newUser ) {
00036       thread.setUser( NULL );
00037       thread.setUser( newUser );
00038       thread.setClientSetting( settings );
00039    }
00040 
00041    ~UserSwitch() {
00042       m_thread.setUser( NULL );
00043       // restore user
00044       m_thread.setUser( m_oldUser );
00045       m_thread.setClientSetting( m_oldClientSetting );
00046       m_thread.releaseUserItem( m_newUser );
00047    }
00048 
00049 private:
00050    ParserThread& m_thread;
00051    UserItem* m_oldUser;
00052    const ClientSetting* m_oldClientSetting;
00053    UserItem* m_newUser;
00054 };
00055 
00056 #endif // USERSWITCH_H
